name: Seldom Seclusion
description:
Seldom Solace is a game about self-isolation and introspection,  and the effects it can have. Explore the cabin, and perhaps find something hidden deeper inside.

Controls- W - forward A - left S - back D - right Mouse - Aim E - Interact (both moveable objects and static objects)

Players can interact with some physics objects, including; chairs, small items, and other odds and ends. Also, E is used for pickups and doors at well.
